column5: anyone have an idea what it might cost to have this unit installed professionall, I have been working 60-70 hours a week for just about a year and have very little time for anything else and that time has a mile long list from my wife.  Any suggestions on where to would be great also I am in the London area. thanks
I believe Angling Outfitters in Woodstock can do install on units they sell, Wouldn't hurt to ask.
Gerry Heels really knows his stuff, but he is in Barrie. Heels Marine Electronics Installations 705 791-8080 [emailÂ protected]
